text: Vilfredo Federico Pareto (born Wilfried Fritz Pareto, 1848-1923) was an Italian engineer, economist, and sociologist. He made several important contributions to economics; he looked at the distribution of income. Pareto efficiency and Pareto distribution are named after him. Category:Italian economists Category:European sociologists Category:1848 births Category:1923 deaths
title: Vilfredo Pareto
